src.order module

class src.order.Order

Bases: object

A class to manage a customer’s pizza order.

pizzas

List of pizzas in the order.

Type:

list of Pizza

cost

Total cost of the order.

Type:

int

paid

Payment status.

Type:

bool

input_pizza(crust, sauce, cheese, toppings)

Create and add a pizza to the order and update the cost.

Parameters:

  • crust (str) – Type of crust.

  • sauce (list of str) – Sauce(s) used.

  • cheese (str) – Type of cheese.

  • toppings (list of str) – Toppings list.

order_paid()

Mark the order as paid.

total_cost

Type:

int

CHEESE_COST = {'mozzarella': 1}
CRUST_COST = {'gluten_free': 7, 'thick': 6, 'thin': 5}
SAUCE_COST = {'liv_sauce': 5, 'marinara': 2, 'pesto': 3}
TOPPING_COST = {'mushrooms': 3, 'pepperoni': 2, 'pineapple': 3}
